function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemic representing an existential threat to society and the practice of research","Impact":"Potential invalidity of research findings before and during the pandemic, leading to unstable and less reliable findings","Mitigation":"Rethinking the design of future studies, demographically representative samples, data collection, interpretation of findings, and translating findings into recommendations","Technologies":"Research methodologies, statistical analysis tools, data collection technologies","People":"Researchers, academia","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations"},{"Description":"Reconfiguration of demographics due to Covid-19","Impact":"Unforeseen changes in morbidity, mortality, and effects across age, gender, and ethnicity","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and analysis of demographic changes, adapting research methodologies to account for demographic shifts","Technologies":"Demographic data analysis tools, population health monitoring technologies","People":"Public health officials, researchers, policy makers","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Rapid increase in Covid-19 publications","Impact":"Overload of information and potential dissemination of unreliable or invalid research","Mitigation":"Implementation of rigorous peer review processes, verification of data sources, and validation of findings","Technologies":"Peer review platforms, data verification and validation tools","People":"Researchers, academic publishers","Owner":"Research institutions, publishing organizations"}]}
